main_definition: In French, 'bon' is an adjective that means good or well-made in a general sense.

meanings_and_examples.example: Il s'agit d'un bon vin français.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A monetary unit of value, specifically referring to the former French currency before the Euro was adopted.
meanings_and_examples.example: Dans les années 1960, un bon était équivalent à environ cinq cent euros.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in informal contexts to express agreement or affirmation, similar to 'yes' or 'right.'
meanings_and_examples.example: Bon, je vais prendre le train demain.
